meanings.sent1: The loud music at the party can overstimulate my senses.
meanings.sent2: The children were overstimulating the puppy with their constant play.
meanings.sent3: I didn't mean to overstimulate the cat with the laser pointer, but it sure was funny to watch.
meanings.sent4: The intense colors in the painting overstimulated my eyes, making them tired quickly.
meanings.sent5: The teacher used bright visuals to overstimulate the students' interest in the topic.

meanings.sent1: The overstimulating video game kept the kids entertained for hours.
meanings.sent2: The overstimulating lights in the room made it hard to relax.
meanings.sent3: The overstimulating flavors of the dish surprised my taste buds.
meanings.sent4: The overstimulating pace of the movie left me feeling exhausted.
meanings.sent5: The overstimulating environment of the amusement park left me feeling overwhelmed.
